021import net.tnemc.core.handlers.player.PlayerInteractHandler;
022import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.BukkitItemStack;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
025import org.bukkit.event.EventHandler;
026import org.bukkit.event.EventPriority;
027import org.bukkit.event.Listener;
028import org.bukkit.event.block.Action;
029import org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent;
030import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack;
031
032/**
033 * PlayerInteractListener
034 *
035 * @author creatorfromhell
036 * @since 0.1.2.0
037 */
038public class PlayerInteractListener implements Listener {
039
040  @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
041  public void onInteract(final PlayerInteractEvent event) {
042
043    final PlayerProvider provider = PluginCore.server().initializePlayer(event.getPlayer());
044
045    final ItemStack stack = event.getItem();
046
047    if(stack == null) return;
048
049    if(event.getAction().equals(Action.RIGHT_CLICK_AIR) ||
050       event.getAction().equals(Action.RIGHT_CLICK_BLOCK)) {
051
052      new PlayerInteractHandler().handle(provider, new BukkitItemStack().of(stack));
053    }
054  }
055}
